title: I have a completely blank skin shard???
body: So i just opened a hextech chest and got a completely blank skin shard, it had no picture, no text to tell me what it was. It was just blank, I could disenchant it but i'm to curious to do that. Anyone know what is going on with that?

replies.body: happened to me too, i just restarted the client and it appeared for me
[Screenshot](https://gyazo.com/08d1905627e8f74558ff8d32c4bc5c92) Same happened to me today, did restart client and got GP skin

This is a fairly uncommon issue that specifically affects the Beta Client. You can swap over to the Legacy Client from the login screen and visit your loot to see if it shows up here instead:

https://i.imgur.com/drrzBd9.png

Let me know if this worked.
